roleset.name: destroy, use up needlessly

role.descr: instrument of destruction (if separate from arg0)

roles.note: Verbnet predicts an instrumental subject. They also bring the distinction between agent and instrument down to intentionality, which we've been trying to avoid. use arg2 when there is also an arg0.

example.name: no instrument
example.text: Program traders argue that a reinstatement of the rule would waste the ``pricing efficiency'' of the futures and stock markets.
example.arg: the ``pricing efficiency'' of the futures and stock markets

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Mary wasted John's fragile self-esteem with a single dirty look.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'waste' based on automatic expansion of 'destroy' Levin class (cl 44). Member of Vncls consume-66-1, destroy-44, pay-68.
